mapper.select: SELECT t.trainerId, a.name, t.phone, t.birthDate, a.email, t.gender, t.payPerSession, t.baseSalary, t.careerYears FROM trainer t JOIN app_user a ON t.trainerId = a.userId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainer (trainerId, phone, gender, birthDate, baseSalary, payPerSession, careerYears, created_at) VALUES (#{trainerId}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{baseSalary}, #{payPerSession},#{careerYears},#{createdAt})
